name: ClickMod
description:
This is mostly just a testing build rn!

In terms of keybinds, everything you need should be shown on screen; however, if you want to use the console, you can open it by pressing `

The current commands in the build are:

@noclip (Toggles noclip)
@clear_all (Deletes all objects)
@clear_console (Clears the console)
@setplayerpos (Teleports the player. Just run this command as it is written here, do not add numbers at the end of the command)
